Articles.Content:
I made a Mun lander in career mode, loaded it up with my best Kerbal's and launched. When I reached the Mun, transferred my 2nd pilot to the lander, and undocked it from my main ship, I found I could not switch to the ship from orbital view, when I went back to the tracking station, the lander did not appear. Tried re-docking, and undocking again, still nothing. Of course, now the lander is spinning, and I can't stop it. 

Worked perfectly fine yesterday. Anyone else run into this problem.

Mods I'm running: 

Kerbal Engineering Redux. (Up to date)

Windows 7, 64bit

Kerbal Version 1.0.3
